extDescr.message: Download modification from steam web page

indexMainMessage.message: Go to the mod page and click the button - Download

downloadTableStatusNewDescription.message: This is the technical stage. The extension registers a new addon for further work with it. If you managed to read this message and the status has not changed, then there is a problem. Try reinstalling the extension or write to the developers

downloadTableStatusInfoDescription.message: Getting information about the status of the mod on the server. If it hasn't been downloaded yet, the extension will prompt you to download it

downloadTableStatusWaitDescription.message: Waiting for the modification to load on the server side

downloadTableStatusManuallyServerErrorBa.message: batch polling of modification statuses ended with an error

downloadTableStatusManuallyServerError40.message: unable to find mod on steam server

downloadTableStatusManuallyServerErrorGo.message: at the stage of waiting for the modification to be loaded by the server, the modification data disappeared

steampageHintError.message: An attempt to contact the server or read the result failed. Reload the page and try again after a while.

steampageHintNotReady.message: The modification is not ready for fast download, downloading the modification may take some time.

steampageHintReady.message: Modification is ready for fast loading.
